main event: A round red and orange object the size of a basketball was sighted in Norwich, Conn. for four seconds on 11/9/57.
interesting points: The object was only in sight for four seconds, indicating a brief appearance.
The report suggests that the object was probably a meteorological balloon based on its description, duration, and flight path.
This was a Ground-Radar observation, adding a level of credibility to the report.
The report does not contain any photographs of the object.
The sighting was classified as 'Probably Balloon' with no mention of an 'Unidentified' conclusion.
result: prosaic explanation - probably a meteorological balloon
sighted object: round red and orange object the size of a basketball
